title: OCE Azirs Looking for Azir Mains or peeps to join!
body:
_This is a repost of my older deleted post from 3-4 months ago_

Hey Everyone, We're looking for fellow Azir mains or just people who love Azir or want to learn and get better at Azir to join our club. Is there a reason? Of course! To chill and have fun! If you're interested in joining this club, please add me in-game. Due to the new rework of Azir, many more people are looking into him and playing him more. We are interested in helping you out and listening to your opinions of Azir's new playstyle and builds. Feel free to ask us in the club chat if you need any help. You'll also be able to use the 
Royal "Azirs" Club tag :P.

IGN: Azirious Bird
Cheers, {{champion:268}}

replies.body: This speaks to me on a personal level.

I'm sure Lord Sesshomahru would be interested, if not already a member xD

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
